abstracts.cdata!:
This Second Export Development Project
            aims to help increase and diversify the country's
            non-oil exports by supporting reforms within the policy
            framework for export development, assisting institutional
            development, and providing finance to exporters. These
            objectives will be achieved through three specific project
            components. They include the expansion of Fondo de Fomento a
            las Exportaciones de Productos Manufacturados' (FOMEX)
            working capital financing of direct exporters and
            introduction of finance for indirect exporters; provision of
            finance for the fixed investment requirements of exporters,
            and support for a technical assistance program for specific
            studies and training.
